column3: ming gi rnam grangs bstan pa dang  mtshan nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis lus bstan pa dang  nges pa'i  tshig bstan pa dang  rnam pa rab tu dbye bas so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4069E.TXT.r#679268#679278#TD4069E.TXT.r_7945;TD4069E.TXT.r_7946# zhes bya ba'i tshig 'dis so // / +gang zhig gsal dang zhes bya ba rgya  cher 'byung ba ni gang zhig don gsal bar smra ba nas gang zhig don go bar byed pa smra ba'i bar ro // /

column3: de la nges pa'i tshig bstan pa ni rnam pa lngas sbyar bar bya ste / / +'di lta ste / / +rtags dang  ngo bo nyid dang  las dang  chos dang  rgyu dang  'bras bus so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4069E.TXT.r#679279#679296#TD4069E.TXT.r_7946;TD4069E.TXT.r_7947;TD4069E.TXT.r_7948# gang zhig gsal dang zhes bya ba rgya  cher 'byung ba ni gang zhig don gsal bar smra ba nas gang zhig don go bar byed pa smra ba'i bar ro // /

column3: de la rnam pa rab tu dbye ba yang rnam pa lngas blta bar bya ste / / +ngo bo nyid kyi rab tu dbye ba  dang  khams kyi rab tu dbye ba dang  dus kyi rab tu dbye ba dang  gnas skabs kyi rab tu dbye ba dang  gang zag gi rab tu dbye bas so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4069E.TXT.r#679296#679306#TD4069E.TXT.r_7948;TD4069E.TXT.r_7949# de la rang gi phyogs 'dzugs pa ni phas kyi rgol ba tshar ba can nas rang gi phyogs sangs rgyas kyi gsung 'dzugs pa byed pa yin par rig par bya'o // /

column3: de la ngo bo nyid kyi rab tu dbye ba ni 'di lta ste / / +gzugs ni gzugs can gyi skye mched bcu'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4069E.TXT.r#679307#679315#TD4069E.TXT.r_7948;TD4069E.TXT.r_7949# de la rang gi phyogs 'dzugs pa ni phas kyi rgol ba tshar ba can nas rang gi phyogs sangs rgyas kyi gsung 'dzugs pa byed pa yin par rig par bya'o // / +chos ston pa  ni gang zhig chos khon phyin ci ma log par ston cing legs par bye brag phyed nas mkhas pa gang yin pa'o // /

column3: tshor ba ni rna pa gsum mo // / +'di shes ni 'du shes drug go // / +'du byed ni 'du byed gsum mo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4069E.TXT.r#679316#679325#TD4069E.TXT.r_7949;TD4069E.TXT.r_7950;TD4069E.TXT.r_7951# chos ston pa  ni gang zhig chos khon phyin ci ma log par ston cing legs par bye brag phyed nas mkhas pa gang yin pa'o // / +de la dang po'i ngag yongs su dag pa ni rang gi phyogs 'dzugs pa yin la / /

column3: rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa drug go zhes bya ba dang de lta bu dang mthun pa dag ni ngo bo nyid kyi rab tu dbye ba yin par rig par bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4069E.TXT.r#679326#679335#TD4069E.TXT.r_7950;TD4069E.TXT.r_7951;TD4069E.TXT.r_7952;TD4069E.TXT.r_7953# de la dang po'i ngag yongs su dag pa ni rang gi phyogs 'dzugs pa yin la / / +gzhan gyis brgal du zin kyang snyan par smra ba nyid dang  mi snyan pa mi smra ba nyid kyis so // /

column3: de la khams kyi rab tu dbye ba ni 'dod pa'i khams dang  gzugs kya khams dang gzugs med pa'i khams so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4069E.TXT.r#679336#679343#TD4069E.TXT.r_7952;TD4069E.TXT.r_7953;TD4069E.TXT.r_7954;TD4069E.TXT.r_7955# phas kyi rgol ba la snyan par smra     // / +ba dang  mi snyan par mi smra bas ngag yongs su dag par bstan pa yin te / /

column3: de la    dus kyi rab tu dbye ba ni 'das pa dang  ma 'ongs pa dang  da ltar byung ba'i dus rnams so // / +de la gnas skabs kyi rab tu dbye ba ni rnam pa nyi shu rtsa lngar rig par bya ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4069E.TXT.r#679344#679359#TD4069E.TXT.r_7954;TD4069E.TXT.r_7955;TD4069E.TXT.r_7956;TD4069E.TXT.r_7957# gang gis she na rtsa ba dang po nyid kyis so // / +sems yongs su dag pa ni gzhan gyis te / /

column3: 'di lta ste / / +chung ngu'i gnas skabs dang  'bring gi gnas dang  chen po'i gnas dang  bde ba'i gnas skabs  dang  sdug bsngal gyi gnas skabs dang  sdug bsngal yang ma yin bde ba yang ma yin pa'i gnas skabs dang  dge ba'i gnas skabs dang  mi dge ba'i gnas skabs dang  lung du ma bstan pa'i gnas skabs dang  thos pa'i gnas skabs dang  bsams pa'i gnas skabs dang   bsgoms pa'i gnas skabs dang  lhag pa'i tshul khrims kyi gnas skabs dang  lhag pa'i sems kyi gnas skabs dang  lhag pa'i shes rab kyi gnas skabs dang  nang gi gnas skabs dang  phyi ril gyi gnas skabs dang  gzung ba'i gnas skabs dang  'dzin pa'i gnas skabs  dang ; /
column4: 0.0#TD4069E.TXT.r#679360#679379#TD4069E.TXT.r_7956;TD4069E.TXT.r_7957;TD4069E.TXT.r_7958;TD4069E.TXT.r_7959;TD4069E.TXT.r_7960# de la bsngags pa dang rgyal ba thob kyang zhes bya ba ni bsngags pa thob cing rgyal ba thob kyang de'i nye ba'i nyon mongs pa mi skye bas so // / +'dir  bsngags pa thob cing rgyal ba thob kyang rgyags pa gang yin pa de'i nye ba'i nyon mongs pa mi skye ba ni de'i nye ba'i nyon mongs pa mi skye ba'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4069E.TXT.r#679379#679387#TD4069E.TXT.r_7958;TD4069E.TXT.r_7959;TD4069E.TXT.r_7960;TD4069E.TXT.r_7961# de'i nye ba'i nyon mongs pa mi skye ba'i phyir de'i nye ba'i nyon mongs pa mi skye ba ste / / +sems yongs su dag pa bstan pa yin te / / +rtsa ba gnyis pas so // /
column6: 0.0#TD4069E.TXT.r#679387#679404#TD4069E.TXT.r_7961;TD4069E.TXT.r_7962;TD4069E.TXT.r_7963;TD4069E.TXT.r_7964# gnyis pa'i ngag yongs  su dag pa ni yongs su rdzogs pa dang mi zlos pa dang  tshad ma dang mi 'gal ba dang  don gsal ba'i tshig brjod pa nyid kyis ngag yongs su dag pa bstan pa yin te / /

column3: mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi gnas skabs dang  gnyen po'i gnas skabs dang  mngon sum du gyur pa'i gnas skabs dang  mngon sum du gyur pa ma yin pa'i gnas skabs dang  rgyu'i gnas skabs dang  'bras bu gnas skabs so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4069E.TXT.r#679403#679418#TD4069E.TXT.r_7963;TD4069E.TXT.r_7964;TD4069E.TXT.r_7965;TD4069E.TXT.r_7966;TD4069E.TXT.r_7967# ji ltar byas pas she na / / +yongs su rdzogs pa brjod pas ngag yongs su dag pa bstan pa ni rgyas pa zhes bya  ba'i tshig 'dis so // /

column3: de la gang zag gi rab tu dbye ba ni gang zag nyi shu  rtsa bdun gyis snga ma bzhin du rig par bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4069E.TXT.r#679416#679429#TD4069E.TXT.r_7965;TD4069E.TXT.r_7966;TD4069E.TXT.r_7967;TD4069E.TXT.r_7968;TD4069E.TXT.r_7969# mi zlos par brjod pas mi zlos pa brjod pa ste / / +sna tshogs zhes bya ba'i tshig 'dis so // /

column3: de la rang gis glengs pa'am gzhan gyis brgal ba ni rgol ba'i lan gdab par bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4069E.TXT.r#679427#679439#TD4069E.TXT.r_7967;TD4069E.TXT.r_7968;TD4069E.TXT.r_7969;TD4069E.TXT.r_7970;TD4069E.TXT.r_7971# tshad ma dang mi 'gal ba'i don gyis na tshad ma dang mi 'gal ba'i don gyis te / / +'brel zhes bya ba'i tshig 'dis so // /
column5: 0.018#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#788020#788021#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_3556;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_3557# tshig phyi ma dang sbyor ba ste zhes bya ba la / / +ston par byed pas na tshig ste go bar byed ces bya ba'i don to // /
column6: 0.020#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#835242#835242#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_11370;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_11371# ngag ni tshig ste zhes bya ba la / / +'dis go bar byed cing khong du chud par byed pas na tshig ste / /
column7: 0.022#TD4097E.TXT.r#2226165#2226165#TD4097E.TXT.r_3208# tshig ces bya ba ni 'dis brjod par 'dod pa'i don rtogs par byed pas  tshig ste ; /
column8: 0.024#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#983966#983966#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_12006# de ltar tshig re re'i don rtogs par byas nas de'i 'og tu mdo sde'i tshig gi don ni 'di kho na yin gyi gnas ma yin no zhes gtan la 'bebs shing shes par byed do zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column9: 0.029#TD4097E.TXT.r#2226435#2226436#TD4097E.TXT.r_3252;TD4097E.TXT.r_3253# so sor zhes bya ba'i tshig ni khyab par 'dod pa'i tha tshig go // /

column3: de yang mdor bsdu na rnam pa lngas rgol te / / +don ma rtogs pa ni ma rtogs pas tshig 'bru 'di'i don ci yin zhes rgol lo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4069E.TXT.r#679440#679450#TD4069E.TXT.r_7970;TD4069E.TXT.r_7971# go byed ces bya ba'i tshig 'dis so // / +de'i sems yongs su dag pa ni bdag dang gzhan gyi rgyud la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i bsam pa'i sems zang zing med pa nyid kyis bstan pa yin te / /

column3: tshig 'gal bas ni 'di lta ste bcom  ldan 'das kyis sngar ni gzhan du gsungs la 'dir ni gzhan du gsungs so zhes bya ba lta bus so // /

column5: 0.016#TD4032E.TXT.r#1957195#1957195#TD4032E.TXT.r_5844;TD4032E.TXT.r_5845# khong du chud par byed pas rdo rje'i tshig rnams te / / +rdo rje'i rnam par bshad pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /

column7: 0.020#TD4066E.TXT.r#2118608#2118608#TD4066E.TXT.r_2319;TD4066E.TXT.r_2320# skye mched  bshad pa ni za bar 'dzin pa'i gnyen po'o // / +khams bshad pa ni byed par 'dzin pa'i gnyen po'o // /

column9: 0.025#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#944281#944281#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_6972# phung po dang khams dang skye mched la sogs pa'i chos rnams la the tshom gyur pa'i nyon mongs pa'i gnyen por ni mdo sde'i sde snod bshad pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column10: 0.027#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2386036#2386036#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8942# bshad pa 'di dang sbyar na ni bdag po'i dbang du byas pa'i rnam par bshad pa yin te / /

column3: bcom ldan 'das kyis de dang der rnam grangs du mas don de nyid  yongs su bstan pa lta bus so // / +shin tu lkog tu gyur pas ni 'di lta ste / /

column4: 0.0#TD4069E.TXT.r#679487#679502#TD4069E.TXT.r_7979;TD4069E.TXT.r_7980;TD4069E.TXT.r_7981;TD4069E.TXT.r_7982;TD4069E.TXT.r_7983# dad dang ldan pa blo zhan pa // / +de rnams la ni phan 'dod pas // / +rnam bshad rigs pa'i 'grel bshad yin // /
column5: 0.017#TD4039E.TXT.r#1883429#1883429#TD4039E.TXT.r_8062;TD4039E.TXT.r_8063# rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las mdo sde'i gzhi bsdu ba rdzogs so //// / +rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradzny'a wa rma dang  dzi na mi tra dang   zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba bande ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa / /

column7: 0.020#TD4014E.TXT.r#442259#442259#TD4014E.TXT.r_880;TD4014E.TXT.r_881# 'phags pa bzang po spyod pa'i smon lam gyi rgyal po'i rgya cher 'grel ba slob dpon rgyan bzang pos mdzad pa rdzogs so //// / +rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzny'a na garbha dang zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba ban de ka ba dpal brtsegs rakshi tas bsgyur te bstan la phab pa'o // /
column8: 0.020#TD4020E.TXT.r#2533600#2533600#TD4020E.TXT.r_3317;TD4020E.TXT.r_3318# theg pa chen po mdo sde'i rgyan ces bya ba'i tshig le'ur byas pa 'phags pa byams pas mdzad pa rdzogs so //// / +rgya gar gyi mkhan po sh'akya sim ha dang  zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba bande dpal brtsegs la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan  la phab pa / /
column9: 0.020#TD4022E.TXT.r#398833#398833#TD4022E.TXT.r_142;TD4022E.TXT.r_143# chos dang chos nyid rnam par 'byed pa 'phags pa byams pas mdzad pa rdzogs so //// / +rgya gar gyi mkhan po pandi ta sh'anti bha dra dang  zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal  bas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa las / /
column10: 0.020#TD4029E.TXT.r#2165510#2165510#TD4029E.TXT.r_5921;TD4029E.TXT.r_5922# slob dpon ngo bo nyid med pas mdzad pa rdzogs so //// / +rgya gar gyi mkhan po sh'akya sim ha dang  zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba bande dpal brtsegs kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o //// /
column11: 0.020#TD4051E.TXT.r#1268978#1268978#TD4051E.TXT.r_5441;TD4051E.TXT.r_5442# theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i bshad sbyar slob dpon dge bsnyen btsun pa ngo bo nyid med pa chos rnams la sgyu ma lta bu'i ngo bo nyid du thugs su chud pas mdzad pa rdzogs so //// / +rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang  sh'i len dra bo dhi dang  zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba  pan de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa / /
column12: 0.020#TD4075E.TXT.r#2793920#2793920#TD4075E.TXT.r_59;TD4075E.TXT.r_60# rnal 'byor la 'jug pa'i man ngag slob dpon chos kyi dbang pos mdzad pa rdzogs so //// / +rgya gar gyi mkhan po dza ran da na dang  zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba dge    slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa // /
column13: 0.020#TD4076E.TXT.r#2188613#2188613#TD4076E.TXT.r_119;TD4076E.TXT.r_120# slob dpon mkhas pa rin chen po rin chen 'byung gnas zhi ba'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so //// / +rgya gar gyi mkhan po sh'an ti bha dra dang  zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba 'gos lhas btsas kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa //// /
column14: 0.021#TD4037E.TXT.r#1381086#1381086#TD4037E.TXT.r_8590;TD4037E.TXT.r_8591# byang chub sems dpa'i sa'i go rims  rdzogs so //// / +rgya gar gyi mkhan po pra dzny'a warma dang  zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa //// /
column15: 0.022#TD4026E.TXT.r#320061#320062#TD4026E.TXT.r_8385;TD4026E.TXT.r_8386# theg pa chen po mdo sde'i rgyan gyi bshad pa rdzogs so //// / +rgya gar gyi mkhan po sh'akya singha dang  zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba bande  dpal brtsegs la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa //// /
column16: 0.026#TD4087E.TXT.r#1587733#1587733#TD4087E.TXT.r_4433;TD4087E.TXT.r_4434# rgyu gdags pa rdzogs te gnyis pa'o //// / +rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang pradzny'a bar ma dang  zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba ban de ye shes sde la stsogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te  gtan la phab pa // /
column17: 0.027#TD4088E.TXT.r#2842311#2842311#TD4088E.TXT.r_3428;TD4088E.TXT.r_3429# las gdags pa bshad pa ste gsum pa rdzogs so //// / +rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang  d'a na sh'i la dang  pradzny'a warma dang  zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba bande ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o //// /
column18: 0.029#TD4070E.TXT.r#2823847#2823847#TD4070E.TXT.r_3439;TD4070E.TXT.r_3440# slob dpon dul ba'i lhas sum cu pa'i  'grel bshad byas pa rdzogs so //// / +rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang  sh'i lendra bo dhi dang  d'a na sh'i la dang  zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa //// /

column3: de dag gi lan yang rnam pa lngar go rims bzhin du     // / +rig par bya ste ma rtogs pa la ni rtogs par bya ba'o // / +tshig 'gal ba la ni dgongs pa yang dag par bstan pas rjes su mthun par bya ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4069E.TXT.r#679501#679520#TD4069E.TXT.r_7982;TD4069E.TXT.r_7983;TD4069E.TXT.r_7984# rnam par  bshad pa rigs pa'i bshad pa rdzogs so //// / +rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi shu ddha sing ha dang  sh'akya sing ha dang  lo ts'a ba bande de wendra rakshi tas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa //// /
column5: 0.018#TD4061E.TXT.r#1549642#1549644#TD4061E.TXT.r_5058# rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi shuddha sim ha dang  sh'akya sim ha dang  zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba bande gtsang de bendra rakshi tas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o // /

column3: tshig 'gal ba la dgongs pa yang dag par bstan pas rjes su mthun par bya ba ji lta bar cha du mar snang ba dang  shin tu lkog tu  gyur pa la yang de dang 'dra'o // /

column6: 0.020#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1407843#1407844#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_894# de ltar na spyi la dmigs pa'i phyir zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba ni ji ltar yid kyi rnam par shes pa mig dang rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i dmigs pa dag  phyir bsdus te 'dzin par byed pas de spyi'i mtshan nyid kyi yul can du rnam par gzhag pa de bzhin du / /
column7: 0.020#TD4095E.TXT.r#68708#68708#TD4095E.TXT.r_1120;TD4095E.TXT.r_1121# 'di ltar bskal pa dang po pa rnams lta bu'o // / +de dag gis mig dang  rna ba dang  sna dang  lce dang  lus dang  srog gi dbang po rnams 'thob bo // /
column8: 0.021#TD4035E.TXT.r#157829#157830#TD4035E.TXT.r_5702;TD4035E.TXT.r_5703;TD4035E.TXT.r_5704# bsod nams dang  bsod nams ma yin pa dang  mi gyo bas yongs  su bsgos pa sa bon du gyur pa'i rnam par shes pa gang yin ba dang  sa bon de las byung ba 'bras bur gyur ba gang yin pa'o // / +mig gi rnam par shes pa ji lta bar / / +rna ba dang  sna dang  lce dang  lus dang  yid kyi rnam par shes pa rnams kyang ci rigs par blta bar bya ste / /

column4: 0.0#TD4063E.TXT.r#2406930#2406937#TD4063E.TXT.r_11# mig gi rnam par shes pa dang  rna ba'i rnam  par shes pa dang  sna'i rnam par shes pa dang  lce'i rnam par shes pa dang  lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang  yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang  rnam par smin pa'i rnam par shes pa dang  nyon mongs pa can gyi yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o // /

column4: 0.0#TD4078E.TXT.r#679726#679736#TD4078E.TXT.r_35;TD4078E.TXT.r_36# sna'i rtsa bar sna'i dbang po ni mo khabs gshibs pa lta bu'o / / +lce'i 'dab ma la lce'i dbang  po skra'i rtse mo tsam dor nas zla ba phyed pa lta bu'o // /

column3: de ni tshor ba de nyid tshig lhag ma rnams kyis yongs  su rdzogs par brjod pa yin no // / +tshor ba ji lta bar bden pa bzhi la sogs pa la yang de dang 'dra ste tshig dang po dang rjes su mthun par tshig phyi ma phyi ma bshad pa'i go rims yin par rig par bya'o // /

column8: 0.027#TD4068E.TXT.r#601839#601840#TD4068E.TXT.r_3615;TD4068E.TXT.r_3616# mi dge ba byed  pa rnams la yang nga mi dge ba byed do snyam du 'dzin pa'i rang bzhin yod pas na nyon mongs pa'i yid de dge ba'i rang bzhin yang MA YIN NO // / +gal te nyon mongs pa'i yid de mi dge ba'i rang bzhin yin na ni dge ba byed pa rnams la mi dge ba byed pas nyon mongs pa'i yid med pa'i phyir bdag dge     // /

column3: de la bsgrub pa'i mtshams sbyar ba ni rnam pa gnyis te / / +lan 'ga' ni tshig snga ma tshig phyi ma'i  bsgrub pa yin la lan 'ga' ni tshig phyi ma tshig snga ma'i bsgrub pa yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4078E.TXT.r#679757#679776#TD4078E.TXT.r_39;TD4078E.TXT.r_40;TD4078E.TXT.r_41# bdag bzhin du sems can thams cad kyang yul dang  dbang po dang rnam par shes pa drug gis gzung ba'i khams bcva brgyad  can no // /

column3: rnam par bshad pa'i mtshams sbyar ba yang de bzhin du blta bar bya'o // / +de la chos bcu dang ldan pa'i chos smra ba ni rnam par thams cad yongs su rdzogs shing chos dang don la mkhas pa yin te / /

column4: 0.0#TD4078E.TXT.r#679795#679802#TD4078E.TXT.r_43;TD4078E.TXT.r_44;TD4078E.TXT.r_45# de nas  zhi gnas grub pa la brten nas sna tshogs kyi gzugs brnyan 'di dag tsam ni chos thams cad do // / +'di lta ste / /

column3: rgyal rigs la sogs pa'i 'khor rnams la chos ston pa na zhum pa med cing de'i rgyu las byung  ba'i skad 'dar ba dang mchan khung rdul ba dang  dran pas brjed pa med pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: tshig dge zhing tshig gi bya ba dang ldan pa yin te / / +yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i tshig dang ldan zhing 'khor la tshig dang yi ge 'byor pa dang 'brel pa la sogs pa rgyas pas chos ston par byed pa'i phyir te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4078E.TXT.r#679828#679836#TD4078E.TXT.r_48;TD4078E.TXT.r_49# de'i rjes la de dag nyid rnam    par rtog pa'i gzugs brnyan dang  de la dmigs pa de nyid kyi sems gnyi ga mnyam par bar chad med par yid la byed pa'i rgyun zhi gnas dang lhag mthong de dag nyid zung du 'brel par 'jug pa'i lam mo // /

column6: 0.0#TD4078E.TXT.r#680040#680050#TD4078E.TXT.r_78;TD4078E.TXT.r_79# de'i rjes la rnam par rtog pa med pa de nyid kyi gzugs brnyan dang  de la dmigs pa de'i sems gnyi ga mnyam pa bar chad med par yid la byed pa'i rgyun zhi gnas dang lhag mthong de dag nyid zung du  'brel par 'jug pa'i lam mo // /

column3: yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i tshig ni grong khyer pa dang snyan zhing 'jebs pa la sogs pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4078E.TXT.r#679846#679853#TD4078E.TXT.r_49;TD4078E.TXT.r_50# shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i man ngag dngos po ji srid pa la dmigs pa dang po'i rnal 'byor gyi sa'o //// / +de nas gnyis pa la sna tshogs su snang ba de nyid la sems bskyed de 'di ltar brtag par bya'o // /

column3: gtam gyi sbyor ba la mkhas pa yin te / / +dus su dad gus pa la sogs pa rnam pa nyi shus gtam la sbyor bar byed pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4078E.TXT.r#679854#679868#TD4078E.TXT.r_50;TD4078E.TXT.r_51;TD4078E.TXT.r_52;TD4078E.TXT.r_53;TD4078E.TXT.r_54# de nas gnyis pa la sna tshogs su snang ba de nyid la sems bskyed de 'di ltar brtag par bya'o // /

column3: chos kyi rjes su mthun pa'i chos la zhugs pa yin te / / +thos pa     // / +dang tshig lhur mi len cing ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4078E.TXT.r#679867#679886#TD4078E.TXT.r_52;TD4078E.TXT.r_53;TD4078E.TXT.r_54;TD4078E.TXT.r_55;TD4078E.TXT.r_56;TD4078E.TXT.r_57# gzugs ming tsam nas yid kyi bar du'o // / +de bzhin du chos thams cad ming tsam mo // / +ming nyid ni don ma yin te / /
column5: 0.009#TD4079E.TXT.r#764811#764818#TD4079E.TXT.r_1412;TD4079E.TXT.r_1413# don mngon par mi shes par ming tsam du snang la / /
column6: 0.014#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#968684#968685#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_10070;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_10071# bum pa dang snam bu la sogs pa'i ming du btags pa rnams brdzun pa sgyu ma rang bzhin yod pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to // / +don ji ltar ming la chags pa'i gnyen por ming de dang thams cad pa byang chub sems dpa' mi dmigs te / /
column7: 0.016#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#451549#451550#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_178;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_179;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_180# yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du don brjod pa'i phyir / / +ming ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa yin no // /
column8: 0.017#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#836343#836343#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_11540# don de go bar 'gyur te yi ge tha ma kho nas ming skyed pa'i phyir dang  ming gis kyang don rjod par BYED PA'I PHYIR RO // /
column9: 0.018#TD4026E.TXT.r#290381#290385#TD4026E.TXT.r_2673;TD4026E.TXT.r_2674;TD4026E.TXT.r_2675# rnam grags gzhan yang ming dang don ji bzhin par ji ming dang don ji lta bar ro // / +don dang ming du snang ba ni don dang ming du snang ba'o // /
column10: 0.022#TD4029E.TXT.r#2138337#2138337#TD4029E.TXT.r_2324;TD4029E.TXT.r_2325# ming tsam du mthong bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni mngon par brjod pa tsam du ste zhes bya ba ni mngon par brjod pa ni yid kyi brjod pa tsam zhes bya ba'i don te / / +de nyid kyi phyir mjug thogs su don dang bral bar ro zhes bshad do // /
column11: 0.022#TD4032E.TXT.r#1942783#1942783#TD4032E.TXT.r_3619;TD4032E.TXT.r_3620# skyes zin pa'i don la ming 'dogs pa'i  phyir ro // / +yang dang yang ming 'dogs pas skyes zin pa yang yang dang yang bskyed dgos par thal bar yang 'gyur ro // /
column12: 0.023#TD4079E.TXT.r#764800#764801#TD4079E.TXT.r_1410;TD4079E.TXT.r_1411# ji srid kyi bar gyi chos thams cad kyang ming tsam ste / / +ming dang  don dag ni shin tu tha dad pa'i phyir ming ni don du yod pa ma yin te / /
column13: 0.026#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1420219#1420219#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_2335# sems kyis mngon par brjod pa'o zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ming la mi ltos par dmigs pa'i don nyams su myong ba tsam la 'jug pa yin no zhes grag go // /
column14: 0.027#TD4050E.TXT.r#1110537#1110537#TD4050E.TXT.r_1821# lhan cig tu sna tshogs kyi rnam pa'i don snang ba 'byung ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni ming dang tshig dang yi ge'i tshogs sna tshogs kyi rnam pa snang ba 'byung ba'i phyir dang  de la brten pa'i don sna tshogs kyi rnam pa snang ba 'byung bya'i phyir ro // /
column15: 0.027#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1457714#1457717#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_6772# brdar btags pa'i sgras don go bar 'gyur pa'i phyir de ni don go bar byed pa'i sgra tsam kho nas 'grub par 'gyur bas de ni  don de rjod par byed pa yin no // /
column16: 0.028#TD4050E.TXT.r#1105893#1105893#TD4050E.TXT.r_1230# sna tshogs kyi rnam pa gnyis su snang ba zhes bya ba ni de don tsam du snang ba dang  rnam par rtog par snang ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i tshig gnyis kyis ston par byed do // /
column17: 0.029#TD4030E.TXT.r#2866811#2866811#TD4030E.TXT.r_285;TD4030E.TXT.r_286# 'di ni 'di'i rjod par byed pa zhes skyes bu'i 'dod pas brtags pa'i brjod bya rjod byed kyi 'brel ba shes pas so // / +de nyid kyi phyir ming ji lta ba'i don ni mi srid pa'i phyir don gyi  dbang du byas nas / /

column3: spyod lam phun sum tshogs pa yin te / / +de gtam zer ba na lag pa sgul bar mi byed de / /
column4: 0.010#TD4079E.TXT.r#764811#764813#TD4079E.TXT.r_1412;TD4079E.TXT.r_1413# don mngon par mi shes par ming tsam du snang la / /
column5: 0.022#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1401402#1401406#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_198;TD4092.1E.TXT.r_199# ma yin pa ni gang po la sogs pa'o // / +don bzhin yin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa ste de'i phyir don ji lta ba bzhin phyin ci ma log par ston pas don bzhin ston pa'o khyad par du byas so // /
column6: 0.025#TD4053E.TXT.r#2998907#2998908#TD4053E.TXT.r_4529;TD4053E.TXT.r_4530# ming ji lta ba bzhin du don du rnam par rtog pa'i gnyen por ming bcos ma la chos de dag so sor brtags nas glo bur gyi ming gis rjes su tha snyad  'dogs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so // / +don ji lta ba bzhin du ming du rnam par rtog pa'i gnyen por byang chub sems dpa'i ming de dag thams cad yang dag par rjes su mi mthong do // /
column7: 0.027#TD4042E.TXT.r#1676962#1676962#TD4042E.TXT.r_34;TD4042E.TXT.r_35# dbul po la phyug po zhes bya ba lta bu dang  gzhan yang don la mi ltos par ming rnam par gzhag pa gang yin pa'o // / +grags pa'i ming ni yongs su rtog pa'i ming gang  yin pa'o // /
column8: 0.028#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#968621#968621#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_10064;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_10065# de'i gnyen por shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'bum las gzugs ni skye ba yang ma yin 'gag pa yang ma yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te don dam par ni gzugs la skye ba dang  'gag pa  dang  kun nas nyon mongs pa dang  rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba med do zhes bya ba'i don to // / +ming ji lta ba bzhin du don yin no mngon par chags pas rnam par rtog pa de'i gnyen por ming ni brdzun pa'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so zhes bya ba la / /

column3: rkang pa sgul bar mi byed / / +smin ma skyod par mi byed / / +mgo sgyur bar mi byed / /
column4: 0.0#TD4078E.TXT.r#679887#679905#TD4078E.TXT.r_57;TD4078E.TXT.r_58;TD4078E.TXT.r_59;TD4078E.TXT.r_60# de'i phyir ming ji lta ba bzhin don med de / /

column3: bzhin sgyur bar mi byed lus sgyur bar mi byed  ba yin no // /
mdzes pa yin te / / +'gro ba dang ldog pa la sogs pa la mdzes pa yin no // / +brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin te / / +de ma thos pa'i chos rnams ni nyan par byed / /
column4: 0.0#TD4078E.TXT.r#679906#679916#TD4078E.TXT.r_60;TD4078E.TXT.r_61;TD4078E.TXT.r_62# yang gang zhig 'jig rten dag gi gzugs rtog pa'i 'di lta bur chos thams cad kyang tha snyad kyi phyir glo bur du ming du btags  pa'o // /

column3: thos pa'i chos rnams ni yongs su byang bar byed la / / +rnal 'byor mi gtong ba dang  yid la byed pa mi gtong ba dang  nang  gi sems kyi zhi gnas mi gtong ba yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4078E.TXT.r#679917#679929#TD4078E.TXT.r_61;TD4078E.TXT.r_62;TD4078E.TXT.r_63;TD4078E.TXT.r_64# de nas gzugs med pa nas ji srid chos thams cad do // / +'di dag ni sems tsam kho na ste / /

column3: ngal ba med pa yin te / / +'khor bzhi po dag la chos ston pas yid yongs su skyo ba med pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4078E.TXT.r#679929#679937#TD4078E.TXT.r_63;TD4078E.TXT.r_64;TD4078E.TXT.r_65# don brdzun pa yin yang don du snang ba ni don du mngon par zhen pa'i bag chags las skye BA YIN TE / / +rgyan po la goms pa'i rgyan po la sogs pa'i rmi lam bzhin no // /

column3: bzod pa dang ldan pa yin te / / +de khros kyang phyir mi khro ba dang  mtshang brus kyang phyir mtshang 'bru bar mi byed pa dang  brgal tam phyir brgal  tam khyad du gsad na yang nongs par mi 'gyur 'khrug par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4078E.TXT.r#679936#679947#TD4078E.TXT.r_64;TD4078E.TXT.r_65;TD4078E.TXT.r_66# rgyan po la goms pa'i rgyan po la sogs pa'i rmi lam bzhin no // / +de la 'di dag ni glo bur du ming du btags pa tsam  ste ; /
column5: 0.0#TD4078E.TXT.r#679948#679955#TD4078E.TXT.r_66;TD4078E.TXT.r_67# yang sems las phyi rol du gyur pa'i sems kyi gzung ba'i don ci yang cung zad kyang yod pa ma yin no // /

column3: de la bshad pa ni rnam pa brgyad de / / +brjid pa dang  rnam par 'grel ba dang ldan pa dang  rgol ba'i lan dang ldan pa dang  rab tu dbye ba dang ldan pa dang  de dang 'brel pa dang  de las gzhan pa las drangs pa dang   spobs pa las byung ba dang  grub pa'i mtha'i rjes su 'brang ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4078E.TXT.r#679954#679964#TD4078E.TXT.r_67;TD4078E.TXT.r_68# de nas gzung ba dang 'dzin pa stong pa nyid brjod pa med pa 'di dag sems tsam nyid du sna tshogs nges par byas nas / /
column5: 0.0#TD4078E.TXT.r#679964#679975#TD4078E.TXT.r_67;TD4078E.TXT.r_68;TD4078E.TXT.r_69;TD4078E.TXT.r_70# de nas gzung ba dang 'dzin pa stong pa nyid brjod pa med pa 'di dag sems tsam nyid du sna tshogs nges par byas nas / / +yid kyis brjod pa thams cad yongs su spangs te / /
column6: 0.027#TD4079E.TXT.r#764918#764918#TD4079E.TXT.r_1430;TD4079E.TXT.r_1431# yid kyi brjod pa thams cad spangs te / / +chos thams cad sems tsam pa de nyid la sems bsdus te / /

column3: de la 'khor ni rnam pa lnga ste / / +khyim na gnas pa'i 'khor dang  rab tu byung ba'i 'khor dang  dad pa dang ldan pa'i 'khor dang  zhe 'gras pa'i 'khor dang  tha mal par gnas pa'i 'khor to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4078E.TXT.r#679976#679989#TD4078E.TXT.r_69;TD4078E.TXT.r_70;TD4078E.TXT.r_71;TD4078E.TXT.r_72# chos thams cad sems tsam nyid  yin pa de nyid la sems nye bar bcings te / / +gyo ba med par byas nas bsdus te zhi gnas bskyed par bya ste / /
column5: 0.029#TD4079E.TXT.r#763969#763969#TD4079E.TXT.r_1278;TD4079E.TXT.r_1279# ji ltar bsams pa de nyid kyi don nang gi ting nge 'dzin gyi  gzugs brnyan gyi spyod yul lhag par mos pas so sor brtag PAR BYA STE / / +ji srid du lus dang sems shin tu sbyangs pa ma skyes pa de srid du ni lhag mthong dang rjes su mthun pa'i yid la byed pa yin la / /

column3: de la brjid pa'i gtam  ni rnam pa lngar rig par bya ste / / +gtan tshigs dang ldan pa dang  dpe dang ldan pa dang tshig gi bya ba dang ldan pa dang  tshig dang  yig 'bru sna tshogs pa dang  go sla ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4078E.TXT.r#679987#680004#TD4078E.TXT.r_71;TD4078E.TXT.r_72;TD4078E.TXT.r_73# ji srid lus dang sems shin tu sbyangs pa thob pa'i bar du'o // / +shin tu sbyangs pa thob pa la brten nas ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul de nyid so sor sna tshogs yang dang yang du rnam par dpyad par bya ste / /
column5: 0.0#TD4078E.TXT.r#680067#680071#TD4078E.TXT.r_80;TD4078E.TXT.r_81# de nas gsum pa la de bzhin du sna tshogs so sor snang ba la sems bskyed cing 'di ltar nye bar BRTAG PAR BYA STE / / +khams bcva brgyad po 'di dag  thams cad sna tshogs rang bzhin med la sems tsam gzung ba dang 'dzin pas stong pa'o // /

column3: de la rnam par 'grel pa dang ldan pa'i gtam ni zab mo gsal bar byed pa'i phyir dang  gsal ba yang zab mo dang ldan  bar rnam par sgrog par byed pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4078E.TXT.r#680002#680010#TD4078E.TXT.r_73;TD4078E.TXT.r_74;TD4078E.TXT.r_75# khams bcva brgyad po 'di dag thams cad sna tshogs rang bzhin med pa sems tsam ste / /
column5: 0.0#TD4078E.TXT.r#680011#680022#TD4078E.TXT.r_73;TD4078E.TXT.r_74;TD4078E.TXT.r_75;TD4078E.TXT.r_76;TD4078E.TXT.r_77# khams bcva brgyad po 'di dag thams cad sna tshogs rang bzhin med pa sems tsam ste / / +gzung ba dang 'dzin pa med pa'o // / +de bzhin du 'di yang dang yang RNAM PAR 'BYED PA DANG  rab tu RNAM PAR 'BYED PA DANG  yongs su rnam par rtog pa dang  yongs su dpyod par byed pa na / /
column6: 0.023#TD4049E.TXT.r#2304401#2304401#TD4049E.TXT.r_2947# chos rnams LA RNAM PAR 'BYED PA DANG  rab tu RNAM PAR 'BYED PA DANG  yongs su rnam par rtog pa dang  yongs su dpyod par byed pa ste / /

column3: de la rgol pa'i lan dang ldan pa'i gtam ni mdor bsdu na rgol ba rnam pa lnga spang pa dang ldan par rig par bya'o // /

column5: 0.019#TD4078E.TXT.r#680273#680273#TD4078E.TXT.r_103;TD4078E.TXT.r_104# yongs su dpyod par byed pa na / / +gang gi tshe sems dang lus shin tu sbyangs pa de'i tshe lhag mthong nges par grub pa yin no // /

column3: de la rab tu dbye ba dang ldan pa'i gtam ni chos re re la yang gcig las 'phros pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa bcu'i bar lam de'i gong ma rab    tu dbye ba rnam par sgrog pa'i phyir te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4078E.TXT.r#679830#679835#TD4078E.TXT.r_48;TD4078E.TXT.r_49# de'i rjes la de dag nyid rnam    par rtog pa'i gzugs brnyan dang  de la dmigs pa de nyid kyi sems gnyi ga mnyam par bar chad med par yid la byed pa'i rgyun zhi gnas dang lhag mthong de dag nyid zung du 'brel par 'jug pa'i lam mo // /
column5: 0.0#TD4078E.TXT.r#680030#680039#TD4078E.TXT.r_77;TD4078E.TXT.r_78# sems shin tu sbyangs pa de'i tshe lhag mthong ngo // / +de'i rjes la rnam par rtog pa med pa de nyid kyi gzugs brnyan dang  de la dmigs pa de'i sems gnyi ga mnyam pa bar chad med par yid la byed pa'i rgyun zhi gnas dang lhag mthong de dag nyid zung du  'brel par 'jug pa'i lam mo // /

column3: 'di lta ste / / +chos gsum las brtsams nas de skad gsungs pas dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi zhes rgya cher bya ba dag go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4078E.TXT.r#680049#680062#TD4078E.TXT.r_79;TD4078E.TXT.r_80# shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i man ngag ji lta ba la dmigs pa gnyis pa'i sa'o //// /
column5: 0.028#TD4079E.TXT.r#765010#765012#TD4079E.TXT.r_1442;TD4079E.TXT.r_1443;TD4079E.TXT.r_1444# ji lta bar gyur pa'i sems tsam la dmigs pa'i rnal 'byor gyi sa ste gnyis pa'o //// / +de nas gsum pa ni / / +sna tshogs snang ba'i  sems de bzhin du bskyed la / /

column3: de la de dang 'brel pa'i gtam ni mdo'i sde dang dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa'i sde la sogs pa de dag nyid las rnam par bshad pa nye bar  sbyor bar byed cing gzhan dag las mjug sdud par mi byed pa gang yin pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4078E.TXT.r#680063#680080#TD4078E.TXT.r_80;TD4078E.TXT.r_81;TD4078E.TXT.r_82# de nas gsum pa la de bzhin du sna tshogs so sor snang ba la sems bskyed cing 'di ltar nye bar brtag par bya ste / /
column5: 0.0#TD4079E.TXT.r#765016#765020#TD4079E.TXT.r_1444;TD4079E.TXT.r_1445;TD4079E.TXT.r_1446# sna tshogs snang ba'i  sems de bzhin du bskyed la / / +'di ltar nye bar brtag par bya ste / /

column3: de la de las gzhan pa las drangs pa'i gtam ni de las gzhan pa'i mdo sdes de nye bar bsgrub pa gang yin pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4078E.TXT.r#680079#680088#TD4078E.TXT.r_81;TD4078E.TXT.r_82# khams bcva brgyad po 'di dag  thams cad sna tshogs rang bzhin med la sems tsam gzung ba dang 'dzin pas stong pa'o // / +yang gang zhig ming so sor snang ba gzugs zhes bya ba dang  sgra zhes bya ba dang  dri zhes bya ba nas ji srid chos thams cad ces bya ba'o // /

column3: de la spobs pa las byung ba'i gtam ni ji ltar 'dod pa'i don de ltar rnam par 'byed par byed pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4078E.TXT.r#680089#680099#TD4078E.TXT.r_82;TD4078E.TXT.r_83# yang gang zhig ming so sor snang ba gzugs zhes bya ba dang  sgra zhes bya ba dang  dri zhes bya ba nas ji srid chos thams cad ces bya ba'o // /

column3: de la grub pa'i mtha'i rjes su 'brang ba'i gtam ni ma mo la brten nas rnam par 'byed par byed pa'am de las gzhan pa gtan la bab par ston pa'i sde la brten nas rnam par 'byed par byed pa gang yin pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4078E.TXT.r#680098#680116#TD4078E.TXT.r_83;TD4078E.TXT.r_84;TD4078E.TXT.r_85;TD4078E.TXT.r_86# gang yang don so sor snang ba 'di lta ste phung  po dang khams dang skye mched du so sor snang ba nas / /

column3: de la khyim na gnas pa'i 'khor la ni nyes par spyad pa smad pa dang legs par spyad  pa stong ba nye bar gnas pa'i chos bstan par bya ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4078E.TXT.r#680117#680128#TD4078E.TXT.r_86;TD4078E.TXT.r_87;TD4078E.TXT.r_88# 'di thams cad ni 'khrul pa'i rgyu mtshan spros pa'i mtshan ma phyin ci log gi rgyu mtshan te / /

column3: de las ldog pa dang 'jug par bya ba'i phyir de la rab tu byung ba'i 'khor la ni bslab pa la nye bar gnas pa lhag pa'i tshul khrims la sogs pa bslab pa gsum las brtsams te myur ba myur ba kho nar bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir chos bstan par  bya'o ; / /
column4: 0.0#TD4078E.TXT.r#680126#680136#TD4078E.TXT.r_86;TD4078E.TXT.r_87;TD4078E.TXT.r_88# 'di thams cad ni 'khrul pa'i rgyu mtshan spros pa'i mtshan ma phyin ci log gi rgyu mtshan te / / +'khrul pa'i  dmigs pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro // / +der snang ba la sogs pa'i blo yang dag pa ma yin pa'i rnam pa des bslad pas snang ba de la dmigs pas kun tu snang ba nyid ces bya ba de 'khrul pa la dmigs pa yin par brjod do // /
column5: 0.0#TD4078E.TXT.r#680137#680148#TD4078E.TXT.r_88;TD4078E.TXT.r_89# der snang ba la sogs pa'i blo yang dag pa ma yin pa'i rnam pa des bslad pas snang ba de la dmigs pas kun tu snang ba nyid ces bya ba de 'khrul pa la dmigs pa yin par brjod do // /

column3: dad pa dang ldan pa la sogs pa'i 'khor rnams la ni phyir zhing 'byung ba dang  tha mal bar gnas par 'gyur ba dang  dad par bya ba'i phyir bstan pa'i che ba nyid dang mthu dang ldan pa'i gtam bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4078E.TXT.r#680149#680162#TD4078E.TXT.r_89;TD4078E.TXT.r_90;TD4078E.TXT.r_91# de'i phyir 'di dag ji srid snang ba de srid 'khrul pa ste / /

column3: de ltar smra bas chos ston pa na gzhan dag gus par nyan pa la sbyor bar bya ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4078E.TXT.r#680163#680170#TD4078E.TXT.r_91# de nas chos 'di dag thams cad kyi don dam pa mthong bar 'dod pas de bzhin du zhi gnas la brten nas 'khrul pa'i rgyu mtshan thams cad mngon sum du snang ba yid la mi byed pas yongs su spang bar bya'o // /

column3: ji ltar sbyar bar  bya zhe na / / +rnam pa gcig gis kyang yod la rnam pa bcu'i bar gyis kyang yod do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4078E.TXT.r#680171#680181#TD4078E.TXT.r_91;TD4078E.TXT.r_92;TD4078E.TXT.r_93# de nas chos 'di dag thams cad kyi don dam pa mthong bar 'dod pas de bzhin du zhi gnas la brten nas 'khrul pa'i rgyu mtshan thams cad mngon sum du snang ba yid la mi byed pas yongs su spang bar bya'o // /

column3: de la re zhig rnam pa gcig gis kyang chos ni phan pa dang bde bar nye bar gnas pa yin pa'i phyir te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4078E.TXT.r#680182#680190#TD4078E.TXT.r_93;TD4078E.TXT.r_94;TD4078E.TXT.r_95# gang  zhig gcig pu dben par 'dug nas bsam gtan la gnas te / /

column3: yang de la phan pa yin la bde ba ma yin pa'i mu bzhi ni 'di lta ste / / +byang chub sems dpa'i sar chos yang dag par  blangs pa'i dbang du byas te bstan pa bzhin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4078E.TXT.r#680188#680207#TD4078E.TXT.r_93;TD4078E.TXT.r_94;TD4078E.TXT.r_95# gang  zhig gcig pu dben par 'dug nas bsam gtan la gnas te / / +gzugs kyi 'du shes thams cad las 'das shing / / +'di ltar thams cad nam mkha'o zhes 'du shes la gnas nas nam mkha' mtha' yas la snyoms par zhugs pa bzhin du byang chub sems dpas khams bcva    brgyad pa sna tshogs so sor snang ba 'di sems tsam du byed de / /

column3: gnyis kyis kyang yod de / / +dam pa'i chos ni gya nom pa'i phyir te / / +gya nom pa de yang skyon med pa dang don che bas rig par bya ba dang  smra ba dang nyan pa'i ngal ba 'bras bu dang bcas par byed pa'i phyir te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4078E.TXT.r#680208#680218#TD4078E.TXT.r_95;TD4078E.TXT.r_96# 'di ltar thams cad nam mkha'o zhes 'du shes la gnas nas nam mkha' mtha' yas la snyoms par zhugs pa bzhin du byang chub sems dpas khams bcva    brgyad pa sna tshogs so sor snang ba 'di sems tsam du byed de / /
column5: 0.027#TD4079E.TXT.r#765151#765151#TD4079E.TXT.r_1468# byang chub sems dpa' 'di yang khams bcva brgyad po sna tshogs sems kyi snang ba tsam la mnyam par gzhag la / /

column3: gzhan du na rang gi bya ba gzhan spangs te smra ba dang     // / +nyan pa'i ngal ba don med par 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4078E.TXT.r#680217#680227#TD4078E.TXT.r_96# yid kyis brjod pa thams cad yongs su spangs nas 'khrul pa dang rtog pa'i rgyu mtshan thams cad spangs shing gzung ba'i mtshan ma thams cad nub nas zhi gnas la brtson par bya'o // /

column3: gsum gyis kyang yod de / / +chos ni ngan song las ldog par byed pa'i phyir dang  bde 'gro thob par byed pa'i phyir dang  mya ngan las 'das pa thob par byed pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4078E.TXT.r#680228#680249#TD4078E.TXT.r_96;TD4078E.TXT.r_97;TD4078E.TXT.r_98;TD4078E.TXT.r_99# yid kyis brjod pa thams cad yongs su spangs nas 'khrul pa dang rtog pa'i rgyu mtshan thams cad spangs shing gzung ba'i mtshan ma thams cad nub nas zhi gnas la brtson par bya'o // /

column3: gsum po de ni gus par byas te mnyan pas 'thob  par 'gyur ro // / +bzhis kyang yod de gus par byas te chos mnyan pas mdo sde la sogs pa'i chos de dag nyid rnam par 'gyur ba dang  chos de yang sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnam pa du ma spong ba dang  dge ba'i chos rnam pa du ma yang dag par len par smra ba dang  de dag mnyan pas thos na spong ba dang  len par byed pa dang  de spangs pa dang  blangs pa'i phyir sdig pa de'i rgyus phyi mar sdug bsngal ba spong bar byed pa dang  de spong ba'i rgyu dang  dge ba yang dag par blangs pa'i rgyus mya ngan las 'das pa 'thob par 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4078E.TXT.r#680250#680257#TD4078E.TXT.r_98;TD4078E.TXT.r_99# de nas zhi gnas de nyid la  gnas nas ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul de nyid chos thams cad stong pa nyid du rab tu rnam PAR 'BYED DO // / +chos 'di dag thams cad ldan pa dang  bral ba dang  gzugs can dang  bstan du med pa dang  thogs pa med pa dang  mtshan nyid gcig pa ste / /
column5: 0.0#TD4078E.TXT.r#680257#680266#TD4078E.TXT.r_99;TD4078E.TXT.r_100;TD4078E.TXT.r_101;TD4078E.TXT.r_102# chos 'di dag thams cad ldan pa dang  bral ba dang  gzugs can dang  bstan du med pa dang  thogs pa med pa dang  mtshan nyid gcig pa ste / /
column6: 0.0#TD4078E.TXT.r#680267#680291#TD4078E.TXT.r_101;TD4078E.TXT.r_102;TD4078E.TXT.r_103;TD4078E.TXT.r_104;TD4078E.TXT.r_105# de ltar rab tu rnam par 'byed / / +yongs su rnam par  rtog par byed / /
column7: 0.026#TD4079E.TXT.r#765280#765280#TD4079E.TXT.r_1484# ting nge 'dzin de nyid kyi spyod yul chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi gzugs brnyan de nyid rab tu rnam par phye la / /
column8: 0.028#TD4041E.TXT.r#1270738#1270738#TD4041E.TXT.r_276;TD4041E.TXT.r_277# rab tu rnam PAR 'BYED DO // / +yongs su rnam par rtog par byed do // /
column9: 0.028#TD4076E.TXT.r#2188353#2188353#TD4076E.TXT.r_75;TD4076E.TXT.r_76;TD4076E.TXT.r_77# rab tu rnam PAR 'BYED DO // / +yongs su rtog go // / +yongs su dpyod par byed do zhes gsungs so // /

column3: lngas kyang yod de / / +bcom ldan 'das kyis chos de ni gzhi dang bcas pa  dang ; / +nges par 'byung ba dang bcas pa dang  ston pa dang bcas pa dang  pha rol gnon pa dang bcas pa dang  cho 'phrul dang bcas pa yin no zhes bya ba ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4078E.TXT.r#680292#680306#TD4078E.TXT.r_105;TD4078E.TXT.r_106;TD4078E.TXT.r_107# de'i rjes la ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul rnam par mi rtog pa de nyid chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi gzugs brnyan dang  de la dmigs pa'i sems de nyid bar med cing bar chad med par yid la byed  pa'i rgyun zhi gnas dang lhag mthong de dag nyid zung du 'brel bar 'jug pa'i lam ste / /

column3: tshig de dag gi rnam par dbye ba rgyas pa ni 'di lta ste rnam grangs bsdu ba las 'byung ba bzhin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4078E.TXT.r#680307#680317#TD4078E.TXT.r_106;TD4078E.TXT.r_107# 'di ni rnal 'byor gsum pa'i sa'o // / +gang gi tshe 'di dag nyid yongs su grub pa na mnyam par gzhag pa snga ma bsgom pa'i stobs kyis 'jug pa lhun gyis grub pa 'du byed pa med par chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa nyid  kyis mngon sum du nyams su myong ba mngon du byed pa / /

column3: yang ldas te / / +ma thos pa mnyan par bya'o / / +zhes bya ba dang  thos pa rnam par byang bar bya'o zhes bya ba dang  som nyi spang bar bya'o zhes bya ba dang  lta ba drang por bya'o zhes bya ba dang  don dang tshig zab mo shes rab kyis rtags par bya'o zhes bya ba ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4078E.TXT.r#680316#680331#TD4078E.TXT.r_107;TD4078E.TXT.r_108;TD4078E.TXT.r_109;TD4078E.TXT.r_110;TD4078E.TXT.r_111# gang gi tshe 'di dag nyid yongs su grub pa na mnyam par gzhag pa snga ma bsgom pa'i stobs kyis 'jug pa lhun gyis grub pa 'du byed pa med par chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa nyid  kyis mngon sum du nyams su myong ba mngon du byed pa / /
column5: 0.0#TD4078E.TXT.r#680331#680342#TD4078E.TXT.r_110;TD4078E.TXT.r_111;TD4078E.TXT.r_112;TD4078E.TXT.r_113# chos dang chos nyid kyi mtshan ma shin tu nub pa / / +snang ba med pa / /

column3: bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam pa de dag gis thos pa dang bsams pa dang bsgoms pa las  byung ba'i shes rab rnam par byang ba'i thabs yongs su bstan pa yin te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4078E.TXT.r#680341#680353#TD4078E.TXT.r_113;TD4078E.TXT.r_114;TD4078E.TXT.r_115# rnam par mi rtog pa'i zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gi bdag nyid can mchog tu gsal bar spyod pa 'jig rten las  'das pa zag pa med pa yang dag pa'i ye shes mngon du 'gyur te / /

column3: rnam pa gnyis kyis ni thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyi'o // / +gnyis kyis ni bsams pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyi'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4078E.TXT.r#680354#680361#TD4078E.TXT.r_114;TD4078E.TXT.r_115# de ni rnal 'byor bzhi pa'i sa'o // / +shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'i man ngag slob dpon chen po ratna aa ka ra sh'an tis mdzad pa rdzogs so //// /
column5: 0.029#TD4079E.TXT.r#766629#766631#TD4079E.TXT.r_1733# shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i man ngag pandi ta chen po ratna aa ka ra sh'an tis mdzad pa rdzogs so //// /

column3: tha mas ni bsgoms pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis rnam par byang ba'i thabs yongs su  bstan pa yin no // / +drug gis kyang yod de / /
column4: 0.0#TD4008E.TXT.r#1588119#1588120#TD4008E.TXT.r_94;TD4008E.TXT.r_95# phung po gsum pa'i sgrub  thabs slob dpon krishna pas mdzad pa rdzogs so //// / +rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po d'i pam ka ra shr'i dzny'an dang  lo ts'a ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur ba'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4078E.TXT.r#680362#680370#TD4078E.TXT.r_115;TD4078E.TXT.r_116# shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'i man ngag slob dpon chen po ratna aa ka ra sh'an tis mdzad pa rdzogs so //// / +rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po dpal rab 'byor zhi ba dang  zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba dge slong ting nge 'dzin bzang pos  bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa // /
column6: 2.384#TD4066E.TXT.r#2120453#2120454#TD4066E.TXT.r_2620;TD4066E.TXT.r_2621# slob dpon blo gros brtan pa sthi ra ma tis mdzad pa rdzogs so //// / +rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang  sh'i len dra bo dhi dang  d'a na sh'i la dang  zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba ba nda ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o //// /
column7: 0.015#TD4090.2E.TXT.r#1084480#1084480#TD4090.2E.TXT.r_5308;TD4090.2E.TXT.r_5309# chos mngon ba'i mdzod kyi bshad ba slob dpon sh'akya'i dge slong dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa 'di rdzogs so //// / +rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang  zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba ban de dpal brtsegs kyis bsgyur zhing zhus te gtan la phab pa //// /
column8: 0.019#TD4075E.TXT.r#2793920#2793921#TD4075E.TXT.r_59;TD4075E.TXT.r_60# rnal 'byor la 'jug pa'i man ngag slob dpon chos kyi dbang pos mdzad pa rdzogs so //// / +rgya gar gyi mkhan po dza ran da na dang  zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba dge    slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa // /
column9: 0.019#TD4000E.TXT.r#2802107#2802108#TD4000E.TXT.r_1009;TD4000E.TXT.r_1010# slob dpon ka ma la sh'i las mdzad pa rdzogs so //// / +rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang  d'a na sh'i la dang   zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba ban de dpal brtsegs rakshi tas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa // /
column10: 0.019#TD4014E.TXT.r#442259#442259#TD4014E.TXT.r_880;TD4014E.TXT.r_881# 'phags pa bzang po spyod pa'i smon lam gyi rgyal po'i rgya cher 'grel ba slob dpon rgyan bzang pos mdzad pa rdzogs so //// / +rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzny'a na garbha dang zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba ban de ka ba dpal brtsegs rakshi tas bsgyur te bstan la phab pa'o // /
column11: 0.019#TD4020E.TXT.r#2533600#2533600#TD4020E.TXT.r_3317;TD4020E.TXT.r_3318# theg pa chen po mdo sde'i rgyan ces bya ba'i tshig le'ur byas pa 'phags pa byams pas mdzad pa rdzogs so //// / +rgya gar gyi mkhan po sh'akya sim ha dang  zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba bande dpal brtsegs la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan  la phab pa / /
column12: 0.019#TD4022E.TXT.r#398833#398834#TD4022E.TXT.r_142;TD4022E.TXT.r_143# chos dang chos nyid rnam par 'byed pa 'phags pa byams pas mdzad pa rdzogs so //// / +rgya gar gyi mkhan po pandi ta sh'anti bha dra dang  zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal  bas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa las / /
column13: 0.019#TD4029E.TXT.r#2165509#2165510#TD4029E.TXT.r_5921;TD4029E.TXT.r_5922# slob dpon ngo bo nyid med pas mdzad pa rdzogs so //// / +rgya gar gyi mkhan po sh'akya sim ha dang  zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba bande dpal brtsegs kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o //// /
column14: 0.019#TD4051E.TXT.r#1268978#1268979#TD4051E.TXT.r_5441;TD4051E.TXT.r_5442# theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i bshad sbyar slob dpon dge bsnyen btsun pa ngo bo nyid med pa chos rnams la sgyu ma lta bu'i ngo bo nyid du thugs su chud pas mdzad pa rdzogs so //// / +rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang  sh'i len dra bo dhi dang  zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba  pan de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa / /
column15: 0.019#TD4076E.TXT.r#2188613#2188613#TD4076E.TXT.r_119;TD4076E.TXT.r_120# slob dpon mkhas pa rin chen po rin chen 'byung gnas zhi ba'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so //// / +rgya gar gyi mkhan po sh'an ti bha dra dang  zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba 'gos lhas btsas kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa //// /
column16: 0.020#TD4082E.TXT.r#1812878#1812879#TD4082E.TXT.r_756;TD4082E.TXT.r_757# sngom pa nyi shu'i pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon sh'anta rakshi tas mdzad pa rdzogs so //// / +rgya gar gyi mkhan po bidy'a ka ra sing ha dang  zhu chen gyi  lo ts'a ba manydzu shr'i warmas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa // /
column17: 0.021#TD4005E.TXT.r#552783#552784#TD4005E.TXT.r_550;TD4005E.TXT.r_551# slob dpon chen po 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so //// / +rgya gar gyi mkhan po sh'anta rakshi ta dang  bod kyi lo ts'a ba rnyi ba de ba gho sha sa bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o // /
column18: 0.021#TD4045E.TXT.r#397922#397923#TD4045E.TXT.r_404;TD4045E.TXT.r_405# byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi le'u bshad pa slob dpon yon tan 'od  kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so //// / +rgya gar gyi mkhan po pra dzny'a wa rma dang  zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba bende ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o // /
column19: 0.021#TD4067E.TXT.r#1097153#1097154#TD4067E.TXT.r_1813;TD4067E.TXT.r_1814# phung po lnga'i 'grel pa slob dpon yon tan 'od kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so //// / +rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang  d'a na sh'i la dang  zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa //// /
column20: 0.022#TD4021E.TXT.r#2102063#2102064#TD4021E.TXT.r_492;TD4021E.TXT.r_493# bstan bcos dbus dang mtha' rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i tshig le'ur byas pa 'phags pa byams pas mdzad pa rdzogs  so ;; // / +rgya gar gyi mkhan po ji na mi tra dang  sh'i lendra bo dhi dang  zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba bande ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o //// /
column21: 0.022#TD4004E.TXT.r#106900#106900#TD4004E.TXT.r_239;TD4004E.TXT.r_240# slob dpon zhi ba lhas mdzad pa rdzogs so //// / +rgya gar gyi mkhan po dharma r'a dza dang  bod kyi lo ts'a ba 'phags pa shes rab kyis bsgyur ba'o // /
column22: 0.022#TD4065E.TXT.r#435612#435613#TD4065E.TXT.r_1135;TD4065E.TXT.r_1136# slob dpon dul ba'i lhas mdzad pa rdzogs so //// / +rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang  sh'i lendra bo dhi dang  d'a na sh'i la dang  zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba bande ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te  gtan la phab pa // /
column23: 0.023#TD4050E.TXT.r#1121402#1121403#TD4050E.TXT.r_3519;TD4050E.TXT.r_3520# bstan bcos phun du byung ba du byung ma mdzad pa'i slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so //// / +rgya gar gyi mkhan po d'am pam ka ra shr'i dzny'a na dang  lo tstsha ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas / /
column24: 0.023#TD4027E.TXT.r#561169#561170#TD4027E.TXT.r_1619;TD4027E.TXT.r_1620# bstan  bcos dbus dang mtha' rnam par 'byed pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so //// / +rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang  sh'i lendra bo dhi dang  zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba bande ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o //// /
column25: 0.023#TD4032E.TXT.r#1962973#1962974#TD4032E.TXT.r_6796;TD4032E.TXT.r_6797# slob dpon blo brtan gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so //// / +rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang  sh'i lendra bo dhi dang  zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba bande ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la bab pa'o //// /

column27: 0.023#TD4054E.TXT.r#1051837#1051837#TD4054E.TXT.r_9564;TD4054E.TXT.r_9565# chos mngon pa kun nas btus pa'i rnam par bshad pa  zhes bya ba slob dpon rgyal ba'i sras kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so //// / +rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang  zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba bande ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o // /

column30: 0.023#TD4059E.TXT.r#414738#414739#TD4059E.TXT.r_393;TD4059E.TXT.r_394# phung po lnga'i rab tu byed pa slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so //// / +rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang  sh'i lendra bo dhi dang  d'a na sh'i la dang  zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba ban de ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te / /

column33: 0.023#TD4013E.TXT.r#622011#622011#TD4013E.TXT.r_1542;TD4013E.TXT.r_1543# slob  dpon sh'akya'i bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so //// / +rgya gar gyi mkhan po sh'akya seng ha dang  zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba ban de dpal brtsegs kyis zhus te gtan la phab pa'o //// /
column34: 0.023#TD4015E.TXT.r#1972557#1972558#TD4015E.TXT.r_929;TD4015E.TXT.r_930# 'phags pa bzang po spyod pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so //// / +rgya gar gyi mkhan po pandi ta a'a tsarya a'a nanda dang lo ts'a ba dge slong bha dra b'a las bsgyur ba'o //// /
column35: 0.023#TD4061E.TXT.r#1549627#1549627#TD4061E.TXT.r_5057;TD4061E.TXT.r_5058# rnam par bshad pa'i rigs pa slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so //// / +rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi shuddha sim ha dang  sh'akya sim ha dang  zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba bande gtsang de bendra rakshi tas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o // /

column19: 0.0#TD4094.2E.TXT.r#1893926#1893931#TD4094.2E.TXT.r_1259# dge slong dag nga la 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po 'di rnams la lan gsum du bzlas pa dang  rnam  pa bcu gnyis su bskor ba na mig skyes shing shes pa dang rig pa dang blo skyes te de nas bdag lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang  bdud dang bcas pa dang  tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang  dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu'i lha dang mi las rnam par grol zhing mi ldan pa dang   rab tu mi ldan pa dang  sems phyin ci log dang bral zhing lan mang du gnas so // /

column12: 0.016#TD4010E.TXT.r#2254245#2254246#TD4010E.TXT.r_3017# gang gi tshe dge ba'i bshes  gnyen tshol ba dang  sri zhu bya ba dang  gyog bya ba la yid mi skyo bar gyur pa de'i tshe bde bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te / /

column27: 0.025#TD4010E.TXT.r#2276703#2276703#TD4010E.TXT.r_5881# skyes pa dang  bud med dang  rgyal    rigs dang  khyim bdag dang  grong khyer gyi dpon dang  tshong dpon la sogs pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sems can rnams kyi don mdzad de yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur to zhes bya ba yin no // /

column29: 0.026#TD4018E.TXT.r#3090359#3090359#TD4018E.TXT.r_11178# de bzhin gshegs pa gang gi nub mo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par  rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa nas gang gi nub mo yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de'i bar du bcom ldan 'das kyis yi ge gcig kyang ma gsungs ma bshad ces bya ba der dgongs te gsungs pa'i don thams cad mkhyen pas gsungs pa ni ji bzhin du sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa  rnams kyis chos ston pa de bzhin du ngas kyang chos de kho na nyid bshad kyi / /

column3: nor bdun  gyi dbang phyug la rab tu 'god pa'i phyir dang  dge ba'i spyod pa dang dam pa'i chos mnyan pa'i mu ge las rgal te dam pa'i chos kyi lo legs pa la rab tu 'god pa'i phyir dang  ma rig pa'i mun pa zlog pa ste shes rab kyi snad pa bskyed pa'i phyir dang  chu bo bzhi las sgrol ba'i phyir dang   mya ngan las 'das pa'i thang la 'god pa'i phyir dang  nyon mongs pa'i nad gtan du gso ba'i phyir dang  sred pa'i bran las thar par byed pa'i phyir dang  'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa thog ma med pa las thar par byed pa'i phyir te / /

column11: 0.019#TD4042E.TXT.r#1681197#1681198#TD4042E.TXT.r_559# de bzhin du dam pa'i chos legs par rdzogs pa dang  thams cad mkhyen pa dang  thams cad kyi rje dang  bsnyel ba mi mnga' ba'i chos can dang  sems can gyi snying po dang  thu bo dang   bde ba dang sdug bsngal dag gis thugs yongs su ma gtugs pa dang  dbang po'i sgo bsdams pa dang  legs par ldan pa'i phyir dul ba dang  tshul khrims yang dag par blangs pa dang legs par ldan pa'i phyir zhi ba dang  nges pa'i sa la zhugs pa'i phyir dbugs 'byin pa dang  byang  chub thugs su chud pa'i phyir yongs SU MYA NGAN LAS 'DAS PA DANG  sred pa'i zug rdu 'byin pa'i phyir zug rdu 'byin pa dang  ma dul ba la sogs pa dul bar mdzad pa dang  zhi bar mdzad pa snga ma lta bu dang  so so'i skye bo rnams rgyun du zhugs pa dang  lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu  bkod pa'i phyir dbugs ma phyin pa rnams kyi dbugs phyung ba dang  'bras bu dang po dang gnyis pa la gnas pa rnams phyir mi 'ong ba dang dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras BU LA RAB TU BKOD PA'I PHYIR yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams yongs SU MYA NGAN LAS 'DAS PAR mdzad pa dang  gtan pa med pa  dang ; /

column8: 0.014#TD4094.2E.TXT.r#1884417#1884418#TD4094.2E.TXT.r_69;TD4094.2E.TXT.r_70# sgra la dga' ba dang  dri la dga' ba dang  ro la dga' ba dang  reg bya la dga' ba dang  chos la dga' ba dang  chos la kun du dga' ba dang  chos la rab tu dga' ba dang  chos la mngon par dga' ba dang  chos la 'dod chags dang bral ba dang  'gags na lha dang mi  rnams su sdug bsngal bar gnas so // / +dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis ni gzugs kyi kun 'byung ba dang  mi snang ba dang  ro myang ba dang  nyes dmigs dang  nges par 'byung ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen te / /

column18: 0.027#TD4069E.TXT.r#630283#630283#TD4069E.TXT.r_1067# ston pa bzlog pa ni 'di ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so // /
column19: 0.027#TD4036E.TXT.r#48112#48112#TD4036E.TXT.r_7351# bdag ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang  de'i  legs par gsungs pa'i cos 'dul ba dang  de la legs par zhugs pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa de dag dang  tshul khrims mtshungs par gyur cing bslab pa'i gzhi mtshungs par 'gyur ba dang  lta ba mtshungs par 'gyur ba dang  rnyed pa mtshungs shing rnyed pa thun mong du longs  spyod pa dang  byams pa'i lus kyi las dang  ngag gi las dang  yid kyi las dang ldan pa ni bdag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do zhes de ltar bslab pa'i gzhi yongs su dag pa dang  tshul khrims yongs su dag ba rjes su dran pa na / /

column3: sgrub par byed cing bab col gyis ma yin pa dang  nyes dmigs su lta zhing longs spyod par byed la nges par 'byung ba rab tu shes pa dang longs spyod rgud pas mya ngan mi byed sgyid lug par mi byed / /
column4: 0.0#TD4060E.TXT.r#680582#680591#TD4060E.TXT.r_42;TD4060E.TXT.r_43;TD4060E.TXT.r_44;TD4060E.TXT.r_45;TD4060E.TXT.r_46# 'di ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so zhes bya ba dang  dge slong dag nga'i chos ni legs par gsungs pa / /
column5: 0.0#TD4060E.TXT.r#680592#680601#TD4060E.TXT.r_45;TD4060E.TXT.r_46;TD4060E.TXT.r_47;TD4060E.TXT.r_48# rgyu ba bcad pa / / +lha dang ma'i bar dag la yang dag par shin tu bstan pa'o zhes bya ba dang  bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun ni legs par zhugs pa / /
column6: 0.0#TD4069E.TXT.r#630502#630512#TD4069E.TXT.r_1100;TD4069E.TXT.r_1101;TD4069E.TXT.r_1102;TD4069E.TXT.r_1103;TD4069E.TXT.r_1104# bzlog pa ni phyi rol ba dag gi chos ni mi gsal ba dang  ma phye ba'o zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa'o // / +bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun ni legs par zhugs pa rigs par  zhugs pa / /
column7: 5.960#TD4041E.TXT.r#1273913#1273914#TD4041E.TXT.r_770;TD4041E.TXT.r_771;TD4041E.TXT.r_772# sems can thams cad kyis bsams te zhes bya ba ni ci nas kyang 'ga' yang yang dag par mi rigs pa dang yang dag  par mi rtog par mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i bar chad med par yi ge dang sgra'i bye brag rtogs par bya ba'o // / +bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun ni legs par zhugs pa zhes bya ba ni mdor bstan pa'o // /
column8: 0.022#TD4069E.TXT.r#630334#630335#TD4069E.TXT.r_1073;TD4069E.TXT.r_1074;TD4069E.TXT.r_1075# mdo sde dum bu gsum pa las 'byung ba ni dge slong dag nga'i chos ni legs par gsungs pa / / +gsal ba / /

column3: smre sngags 'don par mi byed ces rgyas par bya ba dang  nye du rgud  pas mya ngan mi byed sgyid lug par mi byed smre sngags 'don par mi byed ces rgyas par bya ba dang  nad med pa dang  lang tsho dang  gson pa rgud pas mya ngan mi byed / /
column4: 0.0#TD4060E.TXT.r#680602#680610#TD4060E.TXT.r_46;TD4060E.TXT.r_47;TD4060E.TXT.r_48;TD4060E.TXT.r_49;TD4060E.TXT.r_50# lha dang ma'i bar dag la yang dag par shin tu bstan pa'o zhes bya ba dang  bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun ni legs par zhugs pa / / +rigs par zhugs pa / / +drang por zhugs pa / / +mthun par zhugs pa / /
column5: 0.0#TD4060E.TXT.r#680611#680628#TD4060E.TXT.r_50;TD4060E.TXT.r_51;TD4060E.TXT.r_52;TD4060E.TXT.r_53;TD4060E.TXT.r_54;TD4060E.TXT.r_55;TD4060E.TXT.r_56# chos  rjes su mthun par spyod pa'o zhes bya ba dang  dge slong gang tshul khrims 'chal ba sdig pa'i chos can / /
column6: 5.960#TD4069E.TXT.r#630664#630668#TD4069E.TXT.r_1121;TD4069E.TXT.r_1122;TD4069E.TXT.r_1123;TD4069E.TXT.r_1124;TD4069E.TXT.r_1125# ji ltar rjes su bstan pa bzhin sgrub pa las brtsams nas legs par zhugs  pa nyid du ston pa ni chos dang rjes su mthun par spyod pa zhes bya ba'i tshig 'dis so // / +dge slong gang tshul khrims 'chal ba sdig pa'i chos can / /

column3: sgyid lug par mi byed smre sngags 'don par mi byed ces rgyas par bya ba dang  'dod pa rnams la nyes dmigs su mthong  zhing nges par 'byung ba la phan yon du mthong nas rab tu 'byung ba dang  bas mtha'i gnas mal dben par gnas shing bsam gtan rnams la snyoms par 'jug pa'i bar dang gus par byas te chos mnyan cing zab mo zab par snang ba can 'di pa nyid kyis rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang rjes su  mthun par rtogs pa dang  dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba rgya chan po dge ba des par 'byung ba dang ldan pa 'thob par 'gyur ba ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4060E.TXT.r#680628#680638#TD4060E.TXT.r_55;TD4060E.TXT.r_56;TD4060E.TXT.r_57;TD4060E.TXT.r_58# dge sbyong ma yin par dge sbyong du khas 'che ba / / +tshangs par spyod pa can  ma yin par tshangs par spyod pa can du khas 'che ba de ni / /
column5: 0.0#TD4060E.TXT.r#680639#680650#TD4060E.TXT.r_57;TD4060E.TXT.r_58;TD4060E.TXT.r_59;TD4060E.TXT.r_60# ji ltar rmig pa gcig la rva ni med pa dang / / +rkang pa bzhi la dung gi kha can skad po che // /
column6: 0.0#TD4060E.TXT.r#680651#680660#TD4060E.TXT.r_59;TD4060E.TXT.r_60;TD4060E.TXT.r_61# rtag tu ba lang rnams kyi nang du rab 'gro de // / +'di la khyu mchog sgra ni 'byin par mi byed ltar // /
column7: 0.0#TD4060E.TXT.r#680660#680668#TD4060E.TXT.r_61;TD4060E.TXT.r_62;TD4060E.TXT.r_63# de bzhin 'dir ni kha  cig dran nyer ma bzhag cing // /
column8: 0.016#TD4036E.TXT.r#7335#7337#TD4036E.TXT.r_978# de yang tshul khrims 'chal pa dang  sdig pa'i chos can dang  nang myags pa dang  nyes 'dzag du gyur pa dang   shing rul pa lta bur gyur pa dang  lung bong lta bur kun tu spyod pa dang  dge sbyong ma yin par dge sbyong du khas 'che ba dang  tshangs par spyod pa ma yin par tshangs par spyod par khas 'che ba yin te / /
column9: 0.028#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2773989#2773990#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_10189;TD4038.1E.TXT.r_10190# lung bong ltar kun du spyod pa / / +dge sbyong ma yin par dge sbyong du khas 'che ba / /

column3: bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'phags pa nyan thos sems rtse gcig tu rna ba blags te chos nyan pa ni chos lnga spong zhing chos bdun gyi bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par  'gyur ro zhes gsungs so // /

column3: de bzhin du 'phags pa nyan thos gus par byas te chos nyan pas ni kun 'byung ba'i chos gang ci yang rung ba de dag thams cad 'gog pa'i chos can du rig nas chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba skyed par byed cing rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras  bu thob pa'i tshogs rab tu 'dzin pa'am / /

column3: de bzhin du dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar du 'thob pa'am / / +dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu'i tshogs rab tu 'dzin pa'am / /

column6: 0.019#TD4069E.TXT.r#631404#631404#TD4069E.TXT.r_1228# mdor na zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba ni mdor na mdo sde'i dum bu 'dir nyon mongs pa'i rten gyi dbye ba dang  dmigs pa'i dbye ba dang  rang bzhin gyi dbye ba dang  gnas skabs kyi dbye ba las nyes  dmigs bstan pa ni dge slong dag dge sbyong ngam bram ze gang la la mig ro myong bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i tshig 'di dag gis so // /

column3: de bzhin du rang byang chub bam / / +byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs rab tu 'dzin pa'am / / +de bzhin du bla na med pa yang dag par  rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi tshogs rab tu 'dzin pa'am / /

column3: de bzhin du 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bsam gtan dang rnam par thar pa dang  ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so //// /
column4: 0.0#TD4060E.TXT.r#680740#680747#TD4060E.TXT.r_76# du shas kyis song ba dang  dbang du song ba dang  lag tu song ba dang  bdud nga la sdig 'dod kyi ci 'dod dgur bya ba dang  bdud kyi bcing ba dag gis bcings pa dang  bdud kyi zhags pa dag las yongs su ma grol ba zhes bya'o zhes bya ba dang  mi dge  ba'i chos rnams yang dag par blangs pa'i rgyus mthong ba'i chos nyid la sdug bsngal ba dang  sdug bsngal dang bcas pa dang  phongs pa dang bcas pa dang  gnod pa dang bcas pa dang  yongs su gdung ba dang bcas par gnas pa dang  lus zhig  nas ngan 'gror 'gyur bar rig par bya'o zhes bya ba dang  srog gcod pa kun tu bstan cing bsgoms la lan mang du byas pas sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba dang  sgrib pa lnga po sems nye bar nyon mongs par byed pa dag ni  'dod pa la 'dun pa'i sgrib pa dang  gnod sems dang  rmugs pa dang  gnyid dang  rgod pa dang  'gyod pa dang  the tsom gyi sgrib pa'o zhes bya ba dang  sgyu rtsal shes dag gsum po 'di dag ni sems can rnams kyi las kyi gzhi dang  kun tu 'byung  ba dag yin par rig par bya ste / /

column4: 0.0#TD4060E.TXT.r#680800#680807#TD4060E.TXT.r_76# du shas kyis song ba dang  dbang du song ba dang  lag tu song ba dang  bdud nga la sdig 'dod kyi ci 'dod dgur bya ba dang  bdud kyi bcing ba dag gis bcings pa dang  bdud kyi zhags pa dag las yongs su ma grol ba zhes bya'o zhes bya ba dang  mi dge  ba'i chos rnams yang dag par blangs pa'i rgyus mthong ba'i chos nyid la sdug bsngal ba dang  sdug bsngal dang bcas pa dang  phongs pa dang bcas pa dang  gnod pa dang bcas pa dang  yongs su gdung ba dang bcas par gnas pa dang  lus zhig  nas ngan 'gror 'gyur bar rig par bya'o zhes bya ba dang  srog gcod pa kun tu bstan cing bsgoms la lan mang du byas pas sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba dang  sgrib pa lnga po sems nye bar nyon mongs par byed pa dag ni  'dod pa la 'dun pa'i sgrib pa dang  gnod sems dang  rmugs pa dang  gnyid dang  rgod pa dang  'gyod pa dang  the tsom gyi sgrib pa'o zhes bya ba dang  sgyu rtsal shes dag gsum po 'di dag ni sems can rnams kyi las kyi gzhi dang  kun tu 'byung  ba dag yin par rig par bya ste / /

column3: yon tan rnams mtha' dag yin pa'i phyir dang  dri ma med pa'i phyir dang  gyo ba'i phyir dang  mtshungs pa med pa'i phyir dang  bdag  dang sems can gyi don gyi phrin las can gyi phyir dang  las de la mthu mnga' ba'i phyir te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4060E.TXT.r#680828#680838#TD4060E.TXT.r_78;TD4060E.TXT.r_79;TD4060E.TXT.r_80;TD4060E.TXT.r_81# chags pa ni sems can rnams kyi las kyi gzhi dang  kun 'byung ba dag yin par rig par bya ste / / +sgyu rtsal shes dag zhe sdang dang / /

column6: 0.0#TD4069E.TXT.r#632238#632241#TD4069E.TXT.r_1356# sgyu rtsal shes dag zhe sdang dang gti mug ni sems can rnams  kyi las kyi gzhi dang kun 'byung ba yin par rig par bya ba ste / /

column3: de dag gi rnam par dbye ba rgyas pa ni 'di lta ste / / +rnam par gtan la dbab pa bsdu bar bstan pa bzhin no // /

column3: de la bcom ldan 'das kyi bsngags pa rgyas pa ni bcom ldan 'das de ni yon tan dpag tu  med pa'i phyir bsngags pa mtha' yas pa yin no // /

column4: 0.0#TD4049E.TXT.r#2298878#2298882#TD4049E.TXT.r_2023# lta ba la  'dod chags dang  lhag par zhen pa dang  rnam par bcings pa dang  yongs su zhen pa dang  kun tu 'dod chags kyi rgyus rab tu byung ba rnams dang  rab tu byung ba rnams su rtsod de / /
column5: 0.0#TD4060E.TXT.r#680882#680903#TD4060E.TXT.r_85# zhes bya ba dang  'dod pa'i rgyu dang  'dod pa'i gzhi dang  'dod pa'i dbang du byas pa dang  'dod pa rnams kho na'i rgyus ma dang bu dang nas  rtsod par byed na zhes bya ba dang  chags pa dang  zhen pa dang  'chums pa dang  mdud pa bor ba dang  brgyal ba dang  lhag par chags pa dang  lhag par zhen pa'o zhes bya ba dang  'dod pa la 'dod chags dang  lhag par zhen pa dang  rnam par bcings  ba dang  yongs su zhen pa dang  kun tu 'dod chags kyi rgyus khyim pa rnams dang khyim pa rnams su rtsod par byed do // /

column7: 0.021#TD4069E.TXT.r#633244#633246#TD4069E.TXT.r_1488# skyes pa ni bud med kyi gzugs la chags pa dang  zhen pa dang  'chums pa dang  mdud pa bor ba dang  brgyal ba dang  lhag par chags pa dang  lhag par zhen par gyur pa zhes bya ba ni mdo sde'i dum bu yin no // /

column9: 0.027#TD4067E.TXT.r#1089708#1089709#TD4067E.TXT.r_505# ji skad du 'dod pa la 'dod chags pa dang  lhag par zhen pa dang  rnam par bcing ba dang  yongs su zhen pa dang  kun tu 'dod chags pa'i rgyus khyim pa rnams dang khang khyim pa rnams rtsod do // /

column9: 0.016#TD4067E.TXT.r#1089724#1089725#TD4067E.TXT.r_506# lta ba la 'dod chags PA DANG LHAG PAR ZHEN PA DANG  rnam par  zhen pa dang  rnam par bcing ba dang  yongs su zhen pa dang  kun tu 'dod chags pa'i rgyus rab tu byung ba rnams dang  rab tu byung ba rnams rtsod do zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o // /
column10: 0.017#TD4069E.TXT.r#633656#633656#TD4069E.TXT.r_1540# lta ba kun du 'dod chags kyi rgyus rab tu byung ba rnams dang rab tu byung ba rnams su rtsod par byed do zhes re re la sbyar bar bya'o // /
column11: 0.025#TD4060E.TXT.r#680903#680903#TD4060E.TXT.r_85# zhes bya ba dang  'dod pa'i rgyu dang  'dod pa'i gzhi dang  'dod pa'i dbang du byas pa dang  'dod pa rnams kho na'i rgyus ma dang bu dang nas  rtsod par byed na zhes bya ba dang  chags pa dang  zhen pa dang  'chums pa dang  mdud pa bor ba dang  brgyal ba dang  lhag par chags pa dang  lhag par zhen pa'o zhes bya ba dang  'dod pa la 'dod chags dang  LHAG PAR ZHEN PA DANG  rnam par bcings  ba dang  yongs su zhen pa dang  kun tu 'dod chags kyi rgyus khyim pa rnams dang khyim pa rnams su rtsod par byed do // /
column12: 0.026#TD4069E.TXT.r#633363#633363#TD4069E.TXT.r_1502# bram ze 'dod pa la 'dod chags dang  LHAG PAR ZHEN PA DANG  rnam par bcings pa dang yongs su zhen pa dang  kun du 'dod chags kyi rgyus rgyal po rnams dang rgyal po rnams su rtsod par byed / /

column3: de bzhin du spyan du gyur pa dang  ye shes su gyur pa dang   don du gyur pa dang  chos su gyur pa dang  don gsal ba ston pa dang  don la rton pa yang yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4060E.TXT.r#680934#680945#TD4060E.TXT.r_86;TD4060E.TXT.r_87;TD4060E.TXT.r_88;TD4060E.TXT.r_89;TD4060E.TXT.r_90;TD4060E.TXT.r_91# lta ba la 'dod chags dang  lhag par zhen pa dang  rnam par bcings pa dang  yongs su zhen pa dang  kun tu 'dod chags kyi rgyus  rab tu byung ba rnams dang  rab tu byung ba rnams su rtsod par byed do zhes bya ba dang  dge slong dag sems can de dag la ni don spyod pa med / / +chos spyod pa med / /

column3: de bzhin du 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang por rtogs pa'i phyir dang rang gis rtogs pa'i phyir ma rtogs pa'i don rtogs pa dang  tshangs par spyod pa ma bzhag pa 'jog pa'i phyir lam rig  pa dang  lam ston pa dang  lam gsung ba dang  lam 'dren pa yang yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4060E.TXT.r#680946#680956#TD4060E.TXT.r_90;TD4060E.TXT.r_91# dge legs spyod pa med ces bya ba dang / / +dge slong  dag de ni chu gter chen po dang  chu'i chu bo chen po dang  chu'i tshogs chen po dang  chu'i chu chen po ma yin gyi zhes bya ba dang  thags 'khrugs pa lta bu dang  gru bu 'dzings pa lta bu dang  rtsva mun dza dang  bal ba dza lta bur 'ong ba dang 'gro bar gyur cing / /
column5: 0.0#TD4060E.TXT.r#680956#680969#TD4060E.TXT.r_91# dge slong  dag de ni chu gter chen po dang  chu'i chu bo chen po dang  chu'i tshogs chen po dang  chu'i chu chen po ma yin gyi zhes bya ba dang  thags 'khrugs pa lta bu dang  gru bu 'dzings pa lta bu dang  rtsva mun dza dang  bal ba dza lta bur 'ong ba dang 'gro bar gyur cing / /
column6: 0.0#TD4069E.TXT.r#633844#633852#TD4069E.TXT.r_1573# 'phags ba'i chos 'dul ba la  ni de rgya mtsho dang  dge slong dag de ni chu gter chen po dang  chu'i chu bo chen po dang  chu'i tshogs chen po dang  chu'i chu chen po ma yin gyi / /

column3: de bzhin du bsnyengs pa dang bsnyengs su rung ba dang bral ba'i phyir skyes bu seng ge dang  tshogs chen po yongs su 'dren pa'i phyir skyes bu khyu mchog dang  tshogs kyi mchog yin pa'i phyir skyes bu gtso bo dang  skyon mi mnga'  ba'i phyir skyes bu glang po che dang  thugs shin tu dul ba'i phyir skyes bu cang shes dang  rigs dang brgyud dang gdung la sogs pas mi thams cad zil gyis mnan pa'i phyir skyes bu dam pa dang  tshul khrims dang sgrub pa dang mkhyen pa dang mthu la sogs pas mi thams cad zil gyis mnan pa'i phyir skyes  bu rab mchog dang  'jig rten pa'i chos rnams kyis ma gos pa'i phyir skyes bu pad ma dkar po yang yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4060E.TXT.r#680968#680981#TD4060E.TXT.r_91;TD4060E.TXT.r_92# dge slong  dag de ni chu gter chen po dang  chu'i chu bo chen po dang  chu'i tshogs chen po dang  chu'i chu chen po ma yin gyi zhes bya ba dang  thags 'khrugs pa lta bu dang  gru bu 'dzings pa lta bu dang  rtsva mun dza dang  bal ba dza lta bur 'ong ba dang 'gro bar gyur cing / /

column6: 0.0#TD4060E.TXT.r#680998#681011#TD4060E.TXT.r_94;TD4060E.TXT.r_95# 'khor ba las mi 'da' bar byed pa zhes bya ba dang  sdug bsngal ba mi bzad ba rtsub pa tsha ba yid du mi 'ong ba srog 'phrog pa dag gis zhes bya ba  dang  ci khyod la tshor ba sdug bsngal ba mi bzad pa rtsub ba tsha ba yid du mi 'ong ba srog 'phrog pa skyes pa lus las bral zhing mi skye la / /
column7: 0.0#TD4060E.TXT.r#681012#681023#TD4060E.TXT.r_94;TD4060E.TXT.r_95;TD4060E.TXT.r_96# 'khor ba las mi 'da' bar byed pa zhes bya ba dang  sdug bsngal ba mi bzad ba rtsub pa tsha ba yid du mi 'ong ba srog 'phrog pa dag gis zhes bya ba  dang  ci khyod la tshor ba sdug bsngal ba mi bzad pa rtsub ba tsha ba yid du mi 'ong ba srog 'phrog pa skyes pa lus las bral zhing mi skye la / / +de bral zhing mi skye bar mngon pa yin nam zhes bya ba dang  sdug bsngal nyid gsum ste / /

column9: 1.192#TD4061E.TXT.r#1521062#1521063#TD4061E.TXT.r_1070# de yongs su bzung ba la kun tu 'dzin pas sdug bsngal mang pos gzir ba'i rten du gyur pa nyid  kyi phyir rtsva mun dza dang  bal ba dza lta bur gyur pa'o // /
column10: 0.017#TD4069E.TXT.r#634067#634074#TD4069E.TXT.r_1595;TD4069E.TXT.r_1596# rtsva mun dza dang bal ba dza lta bur gyur pa ni rtsva mun dza lta bur gyur  ba dang  bal ba dza lta bur gyur pa ste / /
column11: 0.019#TD4069E.TXT.r#634205#634205#TD4069E.TXT.r_1615;TD4069E.TXT.r_1616;TD4069E.TXT.r_1617;TD4069E.TXT.r_1618;TD4069E.TXT.r_1619# dge slong dag byis pa so so'i skye bo thos pa dang mi ldan pa ni lus la reg ba'i tshor ba sdug bsngal ba / / +mi zad pa / / +rtsub pa / / +tsha ba / / +yid du mi 'ong ba / /
column12: 0.023#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1732918#1732921#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_4486# bkab pa dang  gyogs pa dang  rab tu 'gebs pa dang  dru bu 'dzings pa lta bu dang  rtsva mun dza dang bal ba dza lta bu dang  'gro ba dang 'ong bar gyur cing 'jig rten 'di  nas 'jig rten pha rol du nying mtshams sbyor bar byed pa / /

column14: 0.023#TD4069E.TXT.r#633969#633971#TD4069E.TXT.r_1584;TD4069E.TXT.r_1585# dge slong dag khyed la gang gis na skye dgu 'di sgrib pa dang  chod pa dang   gyogs pa dang  kun nas gyogs pa dang  bkag ba dang  yog pa dang  kun nas dkris pa dang  thags 'khrugs pa lta bu dang  dru bu 'dzings pa lta bu dang  rtsva mun dza dang ba la ba dza lta bur 'ong ba dang 'gro bar gyur cing 'jig rten 'di nas 'jig rten pha rol dang 'jig rten    pha rol nas 'jig rten 'dir kun du rgyug par byed 'khor bar byed / /

column4: 0.0#TD4060E.TXT.r#681021#681036#TD4060E.TXT.r_95;TD4060E.TXT.r_96;TD4060E.TXT.r_97;TD4060E.TXT.r_98;TD4060E.TXT.r_99;TD4060E.TXT.r_100# de bral zhing mi skye bar mngon pa yin nam zhes bya ba dang  sdug bsngal nyid gsum ste / / +sdug bsngal gyi sdug bsngal nyid dang  'du byed kyi sdug  bsngal nyid dang  'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal nyid do zhes bya ba dang  ji skad du / /

column3: tshul khrims 'byor ba'i phyir dang yun ring po nas tshangs par spyod pa rnam par spyad pa'i phyir dang drang srong chen po rnying pa rnams kyis rtogs pa'i phyir lam thugs su chud pa'i phyir drang srong chen po dang  mu stegs can thams cad dang nyon mongs pa'i bdud la sogs pa las rnam par rgyal ba'i  phyir rnam par rgyal ba dang  gyo ba dang rlom sems la sogs pa thams cad mi mnga' ba'i phyir dang thub pa gsum dang ldan pa'i phyir thub pa dang  skye bo la sogs pa dang phas kyi rgol ba la sogs pa thams cad kyis mi 'phrogs pa'i phyir mi bkri ba dang  sdig pa thams cad nges par    bkrus pa'i phyir khrus can dang  'jig tshogs thams cad las rgal ba'i phyir pha rol tu byon pa yin no // /

column5: 0.0#TD4060E.TXT.r#681047#681056#TD4060E.TXT.r_101# zhes gsungs pa lta bu dang   srog gcod pa dang  drag shul can dang  lag pa khrag dmar ba dang  gsod pa dang  rab tu gsod pa la gnas pa dang  sems can srog chags su gyur pa la ngo tsha med cing snying mi brtse ba la zhugs pa yin la / /
column6: 0.0#TD4060E.TXT.r#681056#681065#TD4060E.TXT.r_101;TD4060E.TXT.r_102;TD4060E.TXT.r_103# zhes gsungs pa lta bu dang   srog gcod pa dang  drag shul can dang  lag pa khrag dmar ba dang  gsod pa dang  rab tu gsod pa la gnas pa dang  sems can srog chags su gyur pa la ngo tsha med cing snying mi brtse ba la zhugs pa yin la / /
column7: 0.0#TD4060E.TXT.r#681065#681075#TD4060E.TXT.r_102;TD4060E.TXT.r_103# tha na srog chags srin bu phre'u dang / / +grog sbur yan chad kyi srog gcod pa mi spang ba yin no zhes bya ba dang  dge slong dag gson pa rnams las gnyid log pa ni stong pa dang  gsog dang  'bras bu med pa dang  don med pa dang  phan yon med pa yin no zhes bya ba dang  byis pa rmongs pa mi  gsal ba mi mkhas pa zhes bya ba dang  byis pa'i rang bzhin can rmongs pa'i rang bzhin can / /
column8: 0.0#TD4060E.TXT.r#681076#681086#TD4060E.TXT.r_103# grog sbur yan chad kyi srog gcod pa mi spang ba yin no zhes bya ba dang  dge slong dag gson pa rnams las gnyid log pa ni stong pa dang  gsog dang  'bras bu med pa dang  don med pa dang  phan yon med pa yin no zhes bya ba dang  byis pa rmongs pa mi  gsal ba mi mkhas pa zhes bya ba dang  byis pa'i rang bzhin can rmongs pa'i rang bzhin can / /
column9: 0.0#TD4060E.TXT.r#681087#681098#TD4060E.TXT.r_103;TD4060E.TXT.r_104# grog sbur yan chad kyi srog gcod pa mi spang ba yin no zhes bya ba dang  dge slong dag gson pa rnams las gnyid log pa ni stong pa dang  gsog dang  'bras bu med pa dang  don med pa dang  phan yon med pa yin no zhes bya ba dang  byis pa rmongs pa mi  gsal ba mi mkhas pa zhes bya ba dang  byis pa'i rang bzhin can rmongs pa'i rang bzhin can / /
column10: 0.0#TD4061E.TXT.r#1521521#1521526#TD4061E.TXT.r_1148;TD4061E.TXT.r_1149# phyin ci log tu mngon du zhen pa'i phyir shes rab 'chal ba'i rang bzhin can no // / +gro bzhin  skyes dge sbyong ngam bram ze gang la la dag gzugs mi rtag pa zhes bya ba ni mdo sde'i dum bu'o // /
column11: 0.0#TD4069E.TXT.r#634595#634602#TD4069E.TXT.r_1682;TD4069E.TXT.r_1683# de ltar na zag pa dang bcas pa'i 'du byed thams cad sdug bsngal ba yin no zhes BSTAN PA YIN NO // / +srog gcod pa dang  drag shul can dang  lag pa  khrag dmar ba dang  gsod pa dang  rab tu gsod pa la gnas pa dang  sems can srog chags su gyur pa la ngo tsha med cing / /
column12: 0.0#TD4069E.TXT.r#634603#634613#TD4069E.TXT.r_1683;TD4069E.TXT.r_1684;TD4069E.TXT.r_1685# srog gcod pa dang  drag shul can dang  lag pa  khrag dmar ba dang  gsod pa dang  rab tu gsod pa la gnas pa dang  sems can srog chags su gyur pa la ngo tsha med cing / /
column13: 0.0#TD4069E.TXT.r#634798#634804#TD4069E.TXT.r_1707# dge slong dag srog rnams las gnyid log pa ni stong pa dang  gsog dang  'bras bu med pa dang   don med pa dang  phan yon med pa yin no zhes bya ba ni mdo sde'i dum bu yin no // /
column14: 0.019#TD4061E.TXT.r#1521475#1521476#TD4061E.TXT.r_1140;TD4061E.TXT.r_1141;TD4061E.TXT.r_1142;TD4061E.TXT.r_1143# lhan cig skyes pa dang  thos pa dang  bsams pa dang  bsgoms pa la byung ba'i shes rab rnams dang mi ldan pa'i phyir yang byis pa nas mi mkhas pa'i bar ro // / +byis pa'i rang bzhin can / / +rmongs pa'i rang bzhin can / / +shes rab 'chal  pa'i rang bzhin can zhes bya ba ni mdo sde'i dum bu ste / /

column3: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa / /

column3: bde ba gshegs pa / / +'jig rten mkhyen pa / / +skyes bu 'dul ba'i  kha lo sgyur ba / / +bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyang yin no // /
